#summary MF/HF to 100MHz Upconverter

PAGE UNDER CONSTRUCTION

The design files can be found in [http://code.google.com/p/opendous/source/browse/trunk/Current_Designs/Upconverter/ SVN].

Converts signals in the 0.1MHz to 60MHz range to signals in the 100.1MHz to 160MHz range.  Intended for use in receiver applications with projects like the FunCube Dongle and RTL-SDR.

Now [http://www.ebay.com/itm/Ham-It-Up-v1-0-RF-Upconverter-For-SDR-Funcube-RTLSDR-MF-HF-Converter-E4000-/150916970582 available] from [http://www.ebay.com/sch/nooelec/m.html NooElec]!

== SDR Software Tuning Instructions ==

Tune to 100.01MHz and see where the nearest peak is (other than 100MHz).  This is the ideal base tuning frequency for your combination of Upconverter and Receiver.
